select count(cb_no) from community_board where cb_no > 0
insert into community_board ( board_no, cb_title, cb_content, cb_file, user_num, categoryNum, cb_addr ) values ( #{board_no}, #{cb_title}, #{cb_content}, #{cb_file}, #{user_num}, #{categoryNum}, #{cb_addr} )
mapper.select: select cb.cb_no, cb.board_no, cb.cb_title, cb.cb_content, cb.cb_file, u.user_name, c.categoryName, t.state, t.district, cb.cb_currentview, cb.cb_view, cb.cb_like, CASE WHEN 24 > TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, cb.cb_regdate, NOW()) THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, cb.cb_regdate, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(cb.cb_regdate, '%Y. %m. %d') END AS cb_regdate from community_board cb join user u on cb.user_num = u.user_num join category c on cb.categoryNum = c.categoryNum join territory t on cb.cb_addr = t.no where cb.cb_no = #{cb_no}

select cb.cb_no, cb.board_no, cb.cb_title, cb.cb_content, cb.cb_file, u.user_name, cb.categoryNum, t.state, t.district, cb.cb_currentview, cb.cb_view, cb.cb_like, cb.cb_regdate from community_board cb join user u on cb.user_num = u.user_num join territory t on cb.cb_addr = t.no order by cb_no, cb_regdate desc
